{{VO/Story
|character           = Yaoyao

<!--Hello-->
|vo_01_01_title      = 初めまして…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 初めまして、ヨォーヨと申します。かたじけなくも歌塵浪市真君の門下生として、教えを学んでおります。外にいる時、もし何かご不便があれば…ぜひヨォーヨに声をかけてください！よろしくお願いします。あ、そうだ、大根の揚げ団子を持ってるの…食べてみて！あっ、でも、食べ過ぎはだめだからね。油っこいものをたくさん食べたら、体への負担が増えちゃうから。ちょうどきれいに洗ったダイコンとお酢も持ってきてるから、もし足りなかったら、冷やし酢和え大根を作ってあげますからね～
|vo_01_01_rm         = Hajimemashite, Yooyo to moushimasu. Katajikenaku mo Kajin Rouichi Shinkun no monkasei to shite, oshie wo manande orimasu. Soto ni iru toki, moshi nani ka gofuben ga areba... zehi Yooyo ni koe wo kakete kudasai! Yoroshiku onegai shimasu. A, sou da, Daikon no Agedango wo motteru no... tabete mite! A', de mo, tabesugi wa dame da kara ne. Aburakkoi mono wo takusan tabetara, karada he no futan ga fuechau kara. Choudo kirei ni aratta daikon to osu mo motte kiteru kara, moshi tarinakattara, hiyashi suae daikon wo tsukutte agemasu kara ne~
|vo_01_01_tl         = Nice to meet you, I'm Yaoyao. I'm a disciple of Streetward Rambler and have the honour of receiving her teachings. If you ever run into any trouble outside... please be sure to call upon Yaoyao! Ah, that's right, I brought some Fried Radish Balls... feel free to try some! Oh, but don't eat too many, okay? Too much oily stuff is hard work for your body, but if you're still hungry, I can use these freshly washed radishes and vinegar to make you a chilled radish dish instead~

|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・道理
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Proverbs
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Proverbs.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 「明日の次は復た明日。『明日』はなんて多いんでしょう。」…とにかく、早く行こう～
|vo_02_01_rm         = "Ashita no tsugi wa mata ashita. 'Ashita' wa nante ooi ndeshou." ...Tonikaku, hayaku ikou~
|vo_02_01_tl         = "Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today." Anyway, let's get going~

|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・好奇心
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Join In the Fun
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Join In the Fun.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = あそこで何か起きたみたい。一目見るだけなら、大丈夫だよね！
|vo_02_02_rm         = Asoko de nani ka okita mitai. Hitome miru dake nara, daijoubu da yo ne!
|vo_02_02_tl         = Looks like something's happening over there. One quick look won't hurt, right?

|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・仙人探し
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Adepti-Seeking
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Adepti-Seeking.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 変なの…どうしていつも「真理を尋ねるために仙人を探してる」って人がいるの？仙人はどこにでもいるじゃない？
|vo_02_03_rm         = Hen-na no... doushite itsumo "shinri wo tasuneru tame ni sennin wo sagashiteru" tte hito ga iru no? Sennin wa doko ni de mo iru ja nai?
|vo_02_03_tl         = It's strange... why do so many people claim to "seek out the adepti in search of the truth"? Can't you find adepti anywhere...?

|vo_03_01_title      = 雨の日…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 聞いて、カエルの鳴き声！雨音の伴奏をしてるみたいだよね？ケロケロケロ～
|vo_03_01_rm         = Kiite, kaeru no nakigoe! Amaoto no bansou wo shiteru mitai da yo ne? Kerokerokero~
|vo_03_01_tl         = Listen, you can hear the frogs! Doesn't it sound like they're singing along to the sound of the rain? Ribbit, ribbit, ribbit~

|vo_03_02_title      = 雷の日…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = う、うわっ！ヨ、ヨォーヨが耳を塞いでいてあげるから、怖かったら手を握ってね。
|vo_03_02_rm         = U, uwa'! Yo, Yooyo ga mimi wo fusaide ite ageru kara, kowakattara te wo nigitte ne.
|vo_03_02_tl         = Wh&mdash;Whaa! Y&mdash;Yaoyao will cover your ears for you, and if you're scared you can hold my hand.

|vo_03_03_title      = 雪の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 雪だ&mdash;&mdash;！ふわふわのコートを着てから、ぶあつい帽子をかぶって、襟巻きも巻くんですよ。ほらほらっ、手袋も忘れちゃダメ。用意ができたら雪だるまを作りにいこう。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Yuki da{{lmdash}}! Fuwafuwa no kooto wo kite kara, buatsui boushi wo kabutte, erimaki mo maku ndesu yo. Hora hora', tebukuro mo wasurecha dame. Youi ga dekitara yukidaruma wo tsukuri ni ikou.
|vo_03_03_tl         = It's snowing! Put on a fluffy coat and a warm hat, and then wrap up in a scarf. Come on, don't forget to wear your gloves, too. And once you're all done, we can go make a snowman.

|vo_03_04_title      = 晴れの日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = いい天気だね、璃月港の埠頭をお散歩しよう～
|vo_03_04_rm         = Ii tenki da ne, Riiywe-kou no futou wo osanpo shiyou~
|vo_03_04_tl         = What nice weather. Let go for a stroll down the docks of Liyue Harbor~

|vo_03_05_title      = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 風に吹き飛ばされないように、気をつけるんですよ。
|vo_03_05_rm         = Kaze ni fukitobasarenai you ni, ki wo tsukeru ndesu yo.
|vo_03_05_tl         = Take care not to be blown away by the wind.

|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = ほら、もう起きる時間ですよ。朝食はもうできてるから、急いで…え、ええ？二度寝したいの？…しょうがないなぁ、だったらあと五分だけだからね！五分後にまた呼びにくるから。はぁ、こんなことなら、早く寝なさいって注意すればよかったな…
|vo_04_01_rm         = Hora, mou okiru jikan desu yo. Choushoku wa mou dekiteru kara, isoide... E, ee? Nidone shitai no? ...Shou ga nai naa, dattara ato gofun dake da kara ne! Gofungo ni mata yobi ni kuru kara. Haa, konna koto nara, hayaku nenasai tte choui sureba yokatta na...
|vo_04_01_tl         = Come on, it's time to get up. Breakfast is all ready, so hurry up and... Hm? What? You want to go back to sleep? ...Fine, but only for five more minutes! I'll come back to get you once those five minutes are over. *Sigh*, if I'd known this would happen, I would have told you to go to bed earlier...

|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = ちゃーんと覚えておくんだよ&mdash;&mdash;お昼を食べた後は、すぐ横になってお昼寝したり、出かけて冒険したりしちゃダメなの。消化に良くないから。
|vo_04_02_rm         = Chaanto oboete oku nda yo{{lmdash}} Ohiru wo tabeta ato wa, sugu yoko ni natte ohirune shitari, dekakete bouken shitari shicha dame na no. Shouka ni yokunai kara.
|vo_04_02_tl         = Now, don't forget &mdash; you mustn't nap or go off on an adventure right after lunch, it's not good for your digestive system!

|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = え～？もう夜なのにまた出かけるの？うぅ…いつ帰ってくるの？もう遅いから、くれぐれも気を付けるんですよ～
|vo_04_03_rm         = E~? Mou yoru na no ni mata dekakeru no? Uu... itsu kaette kuru no? Mou osoi kara, kuregure mo ki wo tsukeru ndesu yo~
|vo_04_03_tl         = What? It's already night and you're going out again? Mn... when will you return? It's already late, so please take extra care~

|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = おやすみ前のお話…前回は…んーと、どこまで話したっけ…璃月は昔から…三眼五顕仙人に守られていて、その…中には…すぅ…
|vo_04_04_rm         = Oyasumi mae no ohanashi... zenkai wa... nn to, doko made hanashita kke... Riiywe wa mukashi kara... Sangan Goken Sennin ni mamorarete ite, sono... naka ni wa... suu...
|vo_04_04_tl         = Now, your bedtime story... where did we get to last time, again...? Since ancient times... the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti have fought to protect Liyue... and amongst those... zzz...

|vo_05_01_title      = ヨォーヨ自身について・璃月港の埠頭
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: The Liyue Docks
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - The Liyue Docks.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 知ってる？璃月港の埠頭はいつも人の声で溢れていて、とっても賑やかなの！葉っぱが地面に落ちる音さえ聞こえちゃうほど静かなうちとは全然違うんだ！だから、ヨォーヨは暇があったら埠頭に行くの。新しく来た船、新しく見聞きすること…それに新しいおもちゃ！
|vo_05_01_rm         = Shitteru? Riiywe-kou no futou wa itsumo hito no koe de afurete ite, tottemo nigiyaka na no! Happa ga jimen ni ochiru oto sae kikoechau hodo shizuka na uchi to wa zenzen chigau nda! Da kara, Yooyo wa hima ga attara futou ni iku no. Atarashiku kita fune, atarashiku mikiki suru koto... sore ni atarashii omocha!
|vo_05_01_tl         = Did you know? You can always hear the bustling of people in Liyue Harbor; it's a very lively place! Compared to my home that's so quiet you can hear the leaves falling to the ground, it's nothing alike! That's why I come to the docks whenever I have free time. I can see new ships, new sights... and new toys!

|vo_05_02_title      = ヨォーヨ自身について・衣食足りて
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Eat Up, Wrap Up
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Eat Up, Wrap Up.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 「衣食足りて礼節を知る」ってことわざがあってね。つまり、外にいる時は、ちゃんとご飯を食べてあったかい服を着るべきっていう…え？そんな意味じゃない？それじゃあ一体どういう意味なの？
|vo_05_02_rm         = "Ishoku tarite reisetsu wo shiru" tte kotowazu ga atte ne. Tsumari, soto ni iru toki wa, chanto gohan wo tabete attakai fuku wo kiru beki tte iu... E? Sonna imi ja nai? Sore jaa ittai dou iu imi na no?
|vo_05_02_tl         = There's a saying that goes: "Well-fed and well-clothed means well-bred." In other words, make sure you eat up and wrap up before going outside... Huh? That's not what it means? Just what exactly does it mean, then?

<!--About Us-->
<!--The following two lines are currently mistranslated in EN. Based on the CN text, these are supposed to have the prefix "About Us" instead of "About Yaoyao." The filenames currently reflect this to avoid further file moving down the line, please leave as is.-->
|vo_06_01_title      = 槍の練習について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Polearm Training
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Polearm Training.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = ヨォーヨ、サボってるわけじゃないよ。槍はすっごく長くて重いから、練習するのが本当に大変なの…幸い、師匠もヨォーヨにはあんまり高みを求めてこないんだ、へへ。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Yooyo, sabotteru wake ja nai yo. Yari wa suggoku nagakute omoi kara, renshuu suru no ga hontou ni taihen na no... saiwai, shishou mo Yooyo ni wa anmari takami wo motomete konai nda, hehe.
|vo_06_01_tl         = 

|vo_06_02_title      = 気掛かりについて…
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Worries
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Worries.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 最近はちゃんと時間通りに食べてる？寒くなってきたけど、服はちゃんと着込んでる？冒険してる時、何か危険な目に遭ったりしてない？ケガはないよね？はぁ、やっぱりヨォーヨを一緒に連れていってよ。「草行露宿」の旅だから、やっぱりあなたが心配なの。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Saikin wa chanto jikandoori ni tabeteru? Samukunatte kita kedo, fuku wa chanto kikonderu? Bouken shiteru toki, nani ka kiken-na me ni attari shite nai? Kega wa nai yo ne? Haa, yappari Yooyo wo issho ni tsurete itte yo. "Soukou roshuku" no tabi da kara, yappari anata ga shinpai na no.
|vo_06_02_tl         = Have you been eating properly? And have you been making sure to wrap up, even if you don't feel cold? You haven't run into danger on your adventures, have you? No injuries, either? *sigh* You really need to take me with you. I can't not be worried when you're journeying and sleeping outdoors.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = ヨォーヨの師匠は三眼五顕仙人だよ！師匠から、神の目は神に認められたことの証だって聞いたの。ヨォーヨは特別なことなんかしてないのにね？神さまと話して、考えを聞きたいな！
|vo_07_01_rm         = Yooyo no shishou wa Sangan Goken Sennin da yo! Shishou kara, Kami no Me wa kami ni mitomerareta koto no akashi da tte kiita no. Yooyo wa tokubetsu na koto nanka shite nai no ni ne? Kami-sama to hanashite, kangae wo kikitai na!
|vo_07_01_tl         = Yaoyao's master is a Mighty and Illuminated Adeptus! Master told me my Vision is a sign of recognition from the gods, but I don't feel like I've done anything special... I'd love to talk to that god and ask her about it!

|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = オセル？海の中にいるすごーく大きな雲来タコさんのこと？あっ！別に食べたいわけじゃないよ。ただ…もし食べるなら、絶対に焼いてから食べてねってことを…言いたかっただけ…！あっ、必ずしも焼く必要はないけど、その…や、焼いたほうが美味しいかなと思って…
|vo_07_02_rm         = Oseru? Umi no naka ni iru sugooku ooki na unrai takosan no koto? A'! Betsu ni tabetai wake ja nai yo. Tada... moshi taberu nara, zettai ni yaite kara tabete ne tte koto wo... iitakatta dake...! A', kanarazushimo yaku hitsuyou nai kedo, sono... Ya, yaita hou ga oishii ka na to omotte...
|vo_07_02_tl         = Osial? You mean that giant octopus in the Sea of Clouds? Ah! Not that I want to eat it or anything. I'm just saying... you should definitely grill it first if you do decide to eat it! Oh, but I'm not saying you have to, it's just... I&mdash;I think it would taste better that way, that's all...

|vo_07_03_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = ヤマガラさんが好きだよ。七七のところに遊びにいくとき、よく道で見かけるんだ。ヨォーヨはヤマガラさんたちと挨拶をするの！ツィッ、ツィッ、ツィッ♪&mdash;&mdash;わ、当たり！賢いんだね！あなたの言う通り、今のはおはようって意味だよ。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Yamagara-san ga suki da yo. Nana no tokoro ni asobi ni iku toki, yoku michi de mikakeru nda. Yooyo wa yamagara-san-tachi to aisatsu wo suru no. Tsi', tsi', tsi'♪{{lmdash}} Wa, atari! Kashikoi nda ne! Anata no yuudoori, ima no wa ohayou tte imi da yo.
|vo_07_03_tl         = I really like finches. I see a lot of them on my way to play with Qiqi and say hello! Cheep, cheep♪ Yup, very good, you're correct! As you guessed, that meant "good morning."

|vo_08_01_title      = 香菱について…
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Xiangling]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Xiangling.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 師姐は最近…何か変な食材を探してたりしてなかったよね？この前、あの大きな雲来タコさんを生で食べたいって言ってたから、ヨォーヨ本気で心配しちゃった。もしお腹を壊したらどうするの？師姐は白先生の苦い薬を飲むのも嫌なのにね。だから師匠に頼んで、師姐を説き伏せてもらったの。また他の危ない食材に目をつけないといいけど…はぁ…
|vo_08_01_rm         = Shii-jie wa saikin... nani ka hen-na shokuzai wo sagashite tari shite nakatta yo ne? Kono mae, ano ooki na unrai takosan wo nama de tabetai tte itteta kara, Yooyo honki de shinpai shichatta. Moshi onaka wo kowashitara dou suru no? Shii-jie wa Byaku-sensei no nigai kusuri wo nomu no mo iya no ni ne. Da kara shishou ni tanonde, Shii-jie wo tokifusete moratta no. Mata hoka no abunai shokuzai ni me wo tsukenai to ii kedo... haa...
|vo_08_01_tl         = Sister Xiangling... she hasn't been searching for any strange ingredients lately, has she? The other day, she said she wanted to eat that giant octopus in the Sea of Clouds raw, so I was really worried. What if she messes up her stomach? I know she'd never take Dr. Bai's bitter medicine even if that did happen... So I asked Master for help, and she convinced her not to do it. I'm just hoping she doesn't get her eye on any more dangerous ingredients... *sigh*

|vo_08_02_title      = 七七について・友達
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Qiqi]]: Friends
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Qiqi - Friends.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 七七は一番の友達だよ！たまにヨォーヨのことを忘れちゃうけど、わざとじゃないって分かってるから。メモを見るように言えば、すぐに思い出してくれるから。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Nana wa ichiban no tomodachi da yo! Tama ni Yooyo no koto wo wasurechau kedo, waza to ja nai tte wakatteru kara. Memo wo miru you ni ieba, sugu ni omoidashite kureru kara.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Qiqi is my best friend! Sometimes she forgets who I am, but I know she doesn't mean it. I just have to remind her to check her notebook, and she remembers me right away.

|vo_08_03_title      = 七七について・一生
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About Qiqi: Forever
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Qiqi - Forever.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 実は、白先生にこっそり聞いたことがあるの。七七を治せる方法はないのって…うん…平気だよ、たとえ一生七七に一々言わなきゃいけなくても、ヨォーヨは大丈夫なの。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Jitsu wa, Byaku-sensei ni kossori kiita koto ga aru no. Nana wo naoseru houhou wa nai no tte... Un... heiki da yo, tatoe isshou Nana ni ichiichi iwanakya ikenakute mo, Yooyo wa daijoubu na no.
|vo_08_03_tl         = To tell you the truth, I once asked Dr. Bai in secret if there was any way to cure Qiqi, but... Mn, it's okay, even if I have to remind her every day for the rest of my life, I'll be fine.

|vo_08_04_title      = 白朮について…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Baizhu]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Baizhu.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 白先生の処方薬はとってもよく効くんだ。確かにちょっと苦いけど、これがいわゆる「良薬口に苦し」ってことだよね！ヨォーヨは分かってるから！あっ、もしかして苦いのが苦手？心配しないで、蜜に漬けた甘～いナツメを持ってるから、薬を飲んだ後に一つ食べれば大丈夫だよ。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Byaku-sensei no shohouyaku wa tottemo yoku kiku nda. Tashika ni chotto nigai kedo, kore ga iwayuru "ryouyaku kuchi ni nigashi" tte koto da yo ne! Yooyo wa wakatteru kara! A', moshi ka shite nigai no ga nigate? Shinpai shinaide, mitsu ni tsukete amaai natsume wo motteru kara, kusuri wo nonda ato ni hitotsu tabereba daijoubu da yo.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Dr. Bai's prescriptions are really effective. I can't deny that they're a bit bitter, but as they say, "good medicine is bitter on the tongue," that much I know! Ah, are you not good with bitter things, perhaps? Don't worry, I've got some super sweet honey-coated dates. Having one of these will take away the aftertaste.

|vo_08_05_title      = 甘雨について…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Ganyu]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Ganyu.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 甘雨ねぇねはいつも仕事がとても多いの。この前なんか、疲れすぎて、芝生に突っ伏して寝てしまったって聞いたよ。はぁ…本当に心配…！そうだ…「抜き打ち検査」をしない？ねぇねがちゃんと自分の世話をしてるかどうか確認しにいこう！あっ…ちょっと待っててね、甘雨ねぇねが好きそうな花や草を少し用意してくるから…
|vo_08_05_rm         = Kan'u-neene wa itsumo shigoto ga totemo ooi no. Kono mae nanka, tsukare sugite, shibafu ni tsuppushite nete shimatta tte kiita yo. Haa... hontou ni shinpai...! Sou da... "nukiuchi kensa" wo shinai? Neene ga chanto jibun no sewa wo shiteru ga dou ka kakunin shi ni ikou! A'... chotto mattete ne, Kan'u-neene ga sukisou na hana ya kusa wo sukoshi youi shite kuru kara...
|vo_08_05_tl         = Big Sister Ganyu is always overloaded with work. I heard that the other day, she was so tired she passed out face-down on the grass. *sigh* ...I really do worry about her. I know, why don't we give her a "surprise inspection"? Let's make sure she's taking proper care of herself! Oh, but... give me a moment, I'm gonna look for some of those herbs and flowers she seems to like first...

|vo_08_06_title      = 刻晴について…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Keqing]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Keqing.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 刻晴ねぇねは気配りが行き届いてて、几帳面な人なの。祝日や正月には、いつも師匠のところに挨拶しにくるよ。これがいわゆる「師を尊び教義を重んずる」ってことでしょう？それとも、「教養があって礼儀にかなった人」って言ったほうがいいのかな？…とにかく、ヨォーヨも刻晴ねぇねを見習うの！
|vo_08_06_rm         = Kokusei-neene wa kikubari ga ikitodoitete, kichoumen na hito na no. Shukujitsu ya shougatsu ni wa, itsumo Shishou no tokoro ni aisatsu shi ni kuru yo. Kore ga iwayuru "shi wo toutobi kyougi wo omonzuru" tte koto deshou? Soretomo, "kyouyo ga atte reigi ni kanatta hito" tte itta hou ga ii no ka na? ...Tonikaku, Yooyo mo Kokusei-neene wo minarau no!
|vo_08_06_tl         = Big Sister Keqing's a very attentitive and meticulous person. She always comes to visit Master during festivals. That's what they call "honoring the creed of respecting your mentors," right? Or would that be "one vell-versed in etiquette and culture"? ...Anyway, Yaoyao will follow her example!

|vo_08_07_title      = 雲菫について…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Yun Jin]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yun Jin.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 雲菫ねぇね？槍を振り回すのがとても上手なんだよ。それに、璃月劇も大人気で、時々師匠に連れられて観にいくの。雲菫ねぇねの舞台ってだけで、いっつも満席なの…うーん、でも…雲菫ねぇねが歌ってるあれは一体どういう意味なんだろう…
|vo_08_07_rm         = Unkin-neene? Yari wo furimawasu no ga totemo jouzu na nda yo. Sore ni, Riiywe geki mo daininki de, tokidoki Shishou ni tsurerarete mi ni iku no. Unkin-neene no butai tte dake de, ittsumo manseki na no... Uun, de mo... Unkin-neene ga utatteru areba wa ittai dou iu imi na ndarou...
|vo_08_07_tl         = Big Sister Yun Jin? She's amazing with a spear. On top of that, she puts on really popular plays Master sometimes takes me to see. Whenever Yun Jin's on stage, every seat sells out... Hm, but the songs she sings... what are they actually about...?

|vo_08_08_title      = 北斗について…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 北斗ねぇねの船はとっても立派だよ～！甘雨ねぇねとの、船には行かないって約束がなかったら、きっと小さな寝床を作る場所まで考えてたな。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Hokuto-neene no fune wa tottemo rippa da yo~! Kan'u-neene to no, fune ni wa ikanai tte yakusoku ga nakattara, kitto chiisana nedoko wo tsukuru basho made kangaeta na.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Big Sister Beidou's ship is really impressive! If it wasn't for the promise I made with Ganyu, I'd even think of making a little bed on it...

|vo_08_09_title      = 申鶴について…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_quest      = The Crane Returns on the Wind
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Shenhe]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shenhe.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 申鶴ねぇねは長い間俗世から離れてて、やっと璃月港に戻ったんだ。きっと慣れてないことも多いはずなの。ヨォーヨも甘雨ねぇねと一緒に申鶴ねぇねのお世話をしたいけど…どう言えばすんなり受け入れてくれるかな？
|vo_08_09_rm         = Shinkaku-neene wa nagai aida zokuse kara hanaretete, yatto Riiywe-kou ni modotta nda. Kitto naretenai koto mo ooi hazu na no. Yooyo mo Kan'u-neene to issho ni Shinkaku-neene no osewa wo shitai kedo... dou ieba sunnari ukeirete kureru ka na?
|vo_08_09_tl         = Big Sister Shenhe's returning to ordinary life in Liyue Harbor after so many years away, it must take a lot of getting used to. I want to help Ganyu take care of her, but... how do I get her to agree?

|vo_08_10_title      = 煙緋について…
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Yanfei]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yanfei.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 煙緋ねぇねはとっても厚い法典を持ってるの。たとえ休暇中で、師匠のところに来てる時でも、絶対持ち歩くんだよ。本当にすごいよね～！あんな重いものをずっと持っていられて、しかもあんなに難しいものを読めるんだもん…
|vo_08_10_rm         = Enhi-neene wa tottemo atsui houten wo motteru no. Tatoe kyuukachuu de, Shishou no tokoro ni kiteru toki de mo, zettai mochi aruku nda yo. Hontou ni sugoi yo ne~! Anna omoi mono wo zutto motte irarete, shika mo anna ni muzukashii mono wo yomeru nda mon...
|vo_08_10_tl         = Big Sister Yanfei always carries that huge legal codex around with her. Even when visiting Master during festivals, she'll still bring it along. If she can carry such a heavy book around, as well as read such difficult things, she must be amazing!

|vo_09_01_title      = ヨォーヨを知る・1
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = ヨォーヨの生まれ？両親は山奥に隠れ住んでて…うーん…そうだね、ヨォーヨは軽策荘の人って言うべきかな。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Yooyo no umare? Ryoushin wa yamaoku ni kakure sundete... uun... Sou da ne, Yooyo wa Keisakusou no hito tte yuubeki ka na.
|vo_09_01_tl         = Where was Yaoyao born? Well, my parents lived deep within the mountains, so... hmm... Oh, I know. I guess you could say I'm from Qingce Village.

|vo_09_02_title      = ヨォーヨを知る・2
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = うちは貴重な薬草の栽培で生計を立ててるよ。おとうもおかあも、忙しい時は家事を忘れちゃってたり、時にはご飯まで忘れてたりってことがよくあるの…はぁ、それはダメでしょう！って感じだよね。ちゃんとあの人たちの世話をしないとね。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Uchi wa kichou-na yakusou no saibai de seikei wo tateteru yo. Otou mo okaa mo, isogashii toki wa kaji wo wasurechatte tari, toki ni wa gohan made wasurete tari tte koto ga yoku aru no... Haa, sore wa dame deshou! tte kanji da yo ne. Chanto ano hito-tachi no sewa wo shinai to ne.
|vo_09_02_tl         = My family makes a living by cultivating precious medicinal herbs. Often when things get busy, my mother and father forget to do the housework or even eat dinner... *sigh* I really don't think that's good! That's why I've gotta take good care of them.

|vo_09_03_title      = ヨォーヨを知る・3
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 小さい頃から山で育ったから、草花とか木とか、動物さんたちはみんなヨォーヨのお友達だよ！あっ、そうだ！ヤマガラさんと話してみたくない？ヨォーヨ案内してあげられるよ、それに伝言もできるんだ。とっても面白いんだから。まずはお土産に、お米をちょっと用意しに行こっか！
|vo_09_03_rm         = Chiisai koro kara yama de sodatta kara, kusabana toka ki toka, doubutsu-san-tachi wa minna Yooyo no otomodachi da yo! A', sou da! Yamagara-san to hanashite mitakunai? Yooyo annai shite agerareru yo, sore ni dengon mo dekiru nda. Tottemo omoshiroi nda kara. Mazu wa omiyage ni, okome wo chotto youi shi ni ikokka!
|vo_09_03_tl         = Since I was raised in the mountains, the flowers, trees, and animals are all my friends! Oh, I know! Why don't you try talking to the finches? Let Yaoyao guide you, and we can communicate with them, it's a lot of fun. But, first, let's get some grains of rice as a gift!

|vo_09_04_title      = ヨォーヨを知る・4
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 璃月はどこにでも仙人がいるの。ヨォーヨは何人もの仙人に会ったことがあるよ！留雲おばちゃんとか、理水おじちゃんとか…一番好きなのは留雲おばちゃん！面白い仙人のものをいっぱいくれるんだよ。それに、その使い方も丁寧に教えてくれるの。本当に色々と勉強させてもらったな！
|vo_09_04_rm         = Riiywe wa doko ni de mo sennin ga iru no. Yooyo wa nannin mo no sennin ni atta koto ga aru yo! Ryuu'un-oba-chan toka, Risui-oji-chan toka... Ichiban suki-na no wa Ryuu'un-oba-chan! Omoshiroi sennin no mono wo ippai kureru nda yo. Sore ni, sono tsukaikata mo teinei ni oshiete kureru no. Hontou ni iroiro to benkyou sasete moratta na!
|vo_09_04_tl         = Adepti are all over Liyue &mdash; Yaoyao's met tons of them! There's Auntie Cloud Retainer, Uncle Mountain Shaper... I like Auntie Cloud Retainer the most! She gives me lots of interesting adepti gadgets and teaches me how to use them. She's really taught me so much!

|vo_09_05_title      = ヨォーヨを知る・5
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 師匠と出会った後、ヨォーヨには仙縁があるって言われて、だから弟子入りさせてもらったんだ。実は、仙縁の意味は今でも分からないの。でも、師匠から物語を聞いたり、師姐と一緒にサボったりして、みんなのそばにいられて賑やかだし、…それに、璃月港のみんなの役にも立てるし、ヨォーヨは大満足！
|vo_09_05_rm         = Shishou to deatta ato, Yooyo ni wa sen'en ga aru tte iwarete, da kara deshi iri sasete moratta nda. Jitsu wa, sen'en no imi wa ima de mo wakaranai no. De mo, Shishou kara monogatari wo kiitari, Shii-jie to issho ni sabottari shite, minna no soba ni irarete nigiyaka da shi, ...Sore ni, Riiywe-kou no minna no yaku ni mo tateru shi, Yooya wa daimanzoku!
|vo_09_05_tl         = When I met Master, she told me I had an affinity with the adepti and took me on as her disciple. To tell you the truth, I still don't understand what she meant by that, but listening to Master's stories, slacking off with Sister Xiangling, having fun with everyone... not to mention being able to help out the people of Liyue Habor, Yaoyao couldn't be happier!

|vo_10_01_title      = ヨォーヨの趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = …「良宵は短く、勝事は巡り逢い難し」って言葉があるでしょう！だから、何か面白いことがあるなら、見に行かなくっちゃ…もしかしたら、ヨォーヨが役に立てるようなことに出会えるかもしれない。そうでしょう？
|vo_10_01_rm         = ..."Ryoushou wa mijikaku, shouji wa meguri aigatashi" tte kotoba ga aru deshou! Da kara, nani ka omoshiroi koto ga aru nara, mi ni ikanakuccha... Moshi ka shitara, Yooyo ga yaku ni tateru you-na koto ni deaeru kamoshirenai. Sou deshou?
|vo_10_01_tl         = There's a saying that goes, "good nights are short, and rarities are hard to come by"! That's why whenever I see something interesting going on, I go check it out... Who knows, I might find something I can help with, don't you think?

|vo_10_02_title      = ヨォーヨの悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = は、はぁ…槍の練習って本当につまらない…月桂とちょっとだけ遊ぼうっと。一休みしたら、すぐ練習を再開するから…
|vo_10_02_rm         = Ha, haa... Yari no renshuu tte hontou ni tsumaranai... Yweegwei to chotto dake asobou tto. Hitoyasumi shitara, sugu renshuu wo saikai suru kara...
|vo_10_02_tl         = *sigh*... Spear-training is so boring... I think I'm gonna play with Yuegui for a bit. Just a short break, and then I'll continue training...

|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 軽策農家料理、お食べくだ菜に水煮魚…こういう璃月本場の味って美味しい上に、賑やかな感じがするんだよね。ん？あなたも好きなの？よかった、それじゃ今度うちに食べにきてくださいな！ヨォーヨが腕を振るうよ！心配しないで、師姐の手伝いをしたことがあるから、料理においても「名師に就いている」って言えるよね！
|vo_10_03_rm         = Keisaku Nouka Ryouri, Otabe Kusadai ni mizunizakana... Kou iu Riiywe honba no aji tte oishii ue ni, nigiyaka na kanji ga suru nda yo ne. N? Anata mo suki-na no? Yokatta, sore ja kondo uchi ni tabe ni kite kudasai na! Yooyo ga ude wo furuu yo! Shinpai shinaide, Shiijie no tetsudai wo shita koto ga aru kara, ryouri ni oite mo "meishi ni tsuite iru" tte ieru yo ne!
|vo_10_03_tl         = Qingce Stir Fry, Come and Get It, simmered fish... Liyue's signature dishes are not only delicious, but create a lively atmosphere. Hm? You like them, too? That's great! You should come to our place to eat sometime, and I'll show you what Yaoyao can do! Don't worry, I've helped Sister Xiangling cook before, so it's safe to say I've "learned from the best"!

|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 申鶴ねぇねが清心を食べすぎて、数日体が弱っちゃったことがあるの！ヨォーヨは体を大切にしてるから、清心は生では食べないよ。え？なんでそんなことを知ってるかって？留雲おばちゃんが教えてくれたんだよ！
|vo_10_04_rm         = Shinkaku-neene ga Seishin wo tabe sugite, suujitsu karada ga yowacchata koto ga aru no! Yooyo wa karada wo taisetsu ni shiteru kara, Seishin wa nama de tabenai yo. E? Nande sonna koto wo shitteru ka tte? Ryuu'un-oba-chan ga oshiete kureta nda yo!
|vo_10_04_tl         = One time, Shenhe ate so many Qingxin she was ill for a few days! I try to take care of my body, so I make sure I never eat raw Qingxin. Huh? How do I know this? Aunty Cloud Retainer told me!

|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = とっても美味しいよ！あなたの腕は師姐のと比べても、なんて言うか…「後ろ髪を引かれる」ね？いや、そうじゃなくて…「甲乙つけがたい」だった！てへへ、あまりにも興奮しちゃって、ヨォーヨ「言葉を選ばなかった」んだ。
|vo_11_01_rm         = Tottemo oishii yo! Anata no ude wa Shii-jie no to kurabete mo, nante iu ka... "ushirogami wo hikakeru" ne? Iya, sou ja nakute... "kouotsu tsukegatai" datta! Tehehe, amari ni mo koufun shichatte, Yooyo "kotoba wo erabanakatta" nda.
|vo_11_01_tl         = This is really good! You might have skills to match Sister Xiangling! What's the saying for it... "you're pulling her hair from behind"? Wait, no, that's not it... "It's hard to tell who's the better," that's what I meant! Ehehe, when I get carried away, I don't "choose my words wisely," as they say.

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 美味しい！今度お料理するときは、ヨォーヨにも声をかけてね。手伝うから～
|vo_11_02_rm         = Oishii! Kondo oryouri suru toki wa, Yooyo ni mo koe wo kakete ne. Tetsudau kara~
|vo_11_02_tl         = Mn, this is good! Let me know next time you want to cook, and I'll help!

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る・3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = えっ…、あなたは普段、こんなものを食べてるの？なんだったら、ヨォーヨが料理を作ってあげようか？外で冒険するには、ちゃんと食べないといけないのに。もし疲れて、体を壊しちゃったらどうするの…
|vo_11_03_rm         = E'..., anata wa fudan, konna mono wo tabeteru no? Nandattara, Yooyo ga ryouri wo tsukutte ageyou ka? Soto de bouken suru ni wa, chanto tabenai to ikenai no ni. Moshi tsukarete, karada wo kowashichattara dou suru no...
|vo_11_03_tl         = Um... is this really the kind of thing you usually eat? Maybe you should let Yaoyao cook for you, it's important to eat well when out adventuring. You don't want something bad to happen if you're too weak...

|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 今日はあなたの誕生日だね。風習に従って、こういう日には長寿麺を食べなくっちゃ。ヨォーヨ、師姐から教わったんだ。ほら、麺がまるまる一本、ぜんぜん途切れてないでしょう？それに、丸い丸い卵も入れておいたんだ、えへへ。早くきて！熱いうちに食べましょうっ。これからの一年、あなたが健康で、円満な日々を送れますように。
|vo_12_01_rm         = Kyou wa anata no tanjoubi da ne. Fuushuu ni shitagatte, kou iu hi ni wa chansoomii wo tabenakuccha. Yooyo, Shii-jie kara osowatta nda. Hora, men ga marumaru ippon, zenzen togiretenai deshou? Sore ni, marui marui tamago mo irete oita nda, ehehe. Hayaku kite! Atsui uchi ni tabemashou'. Kora kara no ichinen, anata ga kenkou de, enman na hibi wo okuremasu you ni.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today's your birthday, right? As per tradition, you should have some longevity noodles like Sister Xiangling taught me to make. See how the noodles didn't break apart at all? I put some nice, round eggs in, too, hee-hee! Come on, eat it while it's hot! I wish you another happy and healthy year.

|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = あれ？槍が軽くなった？短くなってくれるともっといいんだけどな…
|vo_13_01_rm         = Are? Yari ga karukunatta? Mijikakunatte kureru to motto ii nda kedo na...
|vo_13_01_tl         = Oh? Did my spear get lighter? Now, if only it would get shorter...

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = わぁ、今のヨォーヨなら師姐の槍も持てるようになってるかも！この朗報、今すぐ師匠に伝えたいな～
|vo_13_02_rm         = Waa, ima no Yooyo nara Shii-jie no yari mo moteru you ni natteru ka mo! Kono rouhou, ima sugu Shishou ni tsutaetai na~
|vo_13_02_tl         = Whoa, I might even be able to wield Sister Xiangling's spear now! I've got to tell Master the good news right away~

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = みんなよく「勤倹を以て身を立てる」って言うけど、それってこんな感じでしょう？え？「勤」って…勤勉ってだけの意味じゃないの？
|vo_13_03_rm         = Minna yoku "kinken wo motte mi wo tateru" tte iu kedo, sore tte konna kanji deshou? E? "Kin" tte... kinben tte dake no imi ja nai no?

|vo_13_03_tl         = 
|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 人から気にかけてもらうのってこういう感じだったんだ。うん…ヨォーヨがこんな風に成長できて、変われたのは、全部あなたのおかげだよ！「投桃報李」って言葉があるの。安心して、今度はヨォーヨがあなたの安全を守ってあげる！
|vo_13_04_rm         = Hito kara ki ni kakete morai no tte kou iu kanji datta nda. Un... Yooyo ga konna fuu ni seichou dekite, kawareta no wa, zenbu anata no okage da yo! "Toutouhouri" tte kotoba ga aru no. Anshin shite, kondo wa Yooyo ga anata no anzen wo mamotte ageru!
|vo_13_04_tl         = So this is what it feels like to have others looking out for you. Yeah, the progress I've made is all thanks to you, for sure! Rest assured, as goes the art of "giving and receiving," it's Yaoyao's turn to look out for you, now!
}}
